Author: overdramaticteen
Text: Completely normal, it’s just water weight and undigested food. My weight fluctuates within a 6-7 pound range on any given day. Especially if you have disordered eating and are therefore eating irregularly, your body is going to be at very different stages of digestion and waste production even if you weigh yourself at the same time every day.

Author: baswild
Text: Most people don’t weigh themselves on a daily basis so their weight appears more constant. my weight is different everyday because of food weight and water retention so weight fluctuations are pretty common in my experience
